name: Tank Project (aReSprojects)
description:
Game Info

The game is a mixture of the old school Worms with the new mechanics of the Shellshock Live. At this stage, the game only has the core mechanics, but down the line it will have similar mechanics as seen in Shellshock Live.

Project Info

Right now, the game isn’t finished, therefore the gameplay mechanics aren’t as complex as initially planned.

This project is being completely created without using any engine, only relying on a library called Raylib and C++. Even though I’m not fully proficient in C++, I felt this was a good challenge to enhance my skills in C++.
